featured.title: Ethereum Layer 2 Solutions See 43% Growth in TVL This Month
featured.summary: Ethereum Layer 2 scaling solutions Arbitrum and Optimism have seen a combined 43% increase in Total Value Locked (TVL) over the past month, signaling growing adoption of scaling technologies amid Ethereum's continued network congestion.
featured.relevance: Based on your ETH and ARB holdings

news.title: Aave V3 Introduces New Risk Parameters for ETH Collateral
news.summary: Aave has adjusted risk parameters for ETH collateral on its V3 platform, increasing the liquidation threshold to 82.5% and adjusting interest rate models to better reflect market conditions.

news.title: Uniswap Governance Approves Fee Switch for Certain Pools
news.summary: Uniswap governance has approved a proposal to activate protocol fees for selected pools, potentially increasing rewards for UNI stakers and protocol treasury.
news.relevance: Affects your UNI holdings & LP position

news.title: Bitcoin Options Open Interest Reaches All-Time High
news.summary: Bitcoin options open interest has reached an all-time high of $20.5 billion, indicating increased institutional interest and potential market volatility ahead.

news.title: Chainlink Expands Data Feeds to Include Real-World Assets
news.summary: Chainlink has expanded its oracle network to include real-world asset data feeds, enabling DeFi protocols to offer products based on traditional financial markets.

news.title: Curve Finance Launches New Stablecoin Pool with Enhanced Yields
news.summary: Curve Finance has introduced a new stablecoin pool featuring USDC, DAI, and USDT with boosted yields up to 8.5% APY through partnerships with lending protocols.

socialInsights.highlight: Developers discussing potential liquidation parameter adjustments in the next update
Growing consensus about EIP-4844 implementation timeline, with data suggesting September deployment
Multiple projects planning token launches on Arbitrum in Q3, potentially driving more adoption

marketAnalysis.title: DeFi Market Analysis: June 2025
marketAnalysis.summary: DeFi TVL has grown 15% month-over-month, with lending protocols seeing the strongest inflows. Yield farming APYs have stabilized in the 4-8% range for blue-chip protocols. Correlation between DeFi tokens and ETH price remains high at 0.85.
insights: Lending protocols outperforming DEXes in token performance
Stablecoin yields trending upward with rising interest rates
L2 protocols showing strongest user growth metrics
portfolioRecommendations: Consider increasing allocation to lending protocol tokens
Look for opportunities in L2 ecosystem projects
Maintain current stablecoin yield farming positions
